title: Gateway National Recreation Area: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         The Verrazano-Narrows Bridge at Fort Wadsworth, part of the Staten Island Unit. NPS PHOTO  Gateway is open all year round You can Plan Your Visit now. Keep up with our progress by visiting our website. Lend your voice to the conversation about Gateway on our Facebook page.  The three units of Gateway are generally open daily from sunrise to sunset. Specific buildings and areas may be open seasonally or on weekends only.  Hours for Jamaica Bay Unit  Hours for Sandy Hook Unit  Hours for Staten Island Unit
